name: change-color
description: Change color of images and export them

scripts.dist-linux: tsc && ts-node src/test/fix.ts && pkg out/index.js -o dist/splatcur-editor -t node16-linux-x64
scripts.dist-win: tsc && ts-node src/test/fix.ts && pkg out/index.js -o dist/splatcur-editor -t node16-win-x64

author: NorthWestWind
